name: REQUESTED
description: when the customer ask for an estimate. The seller have to calculate and make it.

name: IN CONFIRMATION
description: the estimate is already done and the seller have to wait the customer decision.

name: CONFIRMED ORDER
description: when the seller add technical informations and he have checked the measures.

name: TO PRODUCTION
description: when all information about production are ready for the production manager.

name: IN PRODUCTION
description: when the order is in production.
